-1.title: Remix
-1.plot: A comic book-inspired mural in Montreal; grenades are turned into Faberge eggs; a re-animation of the film "The Night of the Living Dead.".

6.title: Artists Inspired by... Artists
6.plot: A photographer photographs ballet dancers; a make-up artist takes on Picasso; actor and director Sarah Gadon discusses her inspiration.

23.title: Episode #3.23
23.plot: Art pieces of 1990s pop culture replicas reflect what some experienced growing up in an immigrant family.

imdb.plot outline: Exhibitionists is young, daring and born of a passionate and personal connection with innovating artists across genres from diverse communities across Canada. It features provocative artists working in all mediums who are disrupting the status quo whilst celebrating their cultures. From a young poet who conquered Instagram to an daring feminist graffiti artist, Exhibitionists captures their stories. Topical, innovative and riveting, Exhibitionists is the go-to destination to discover Canada's fresh and diverse talents, and to get up close and personal with established icons. Hosted by actor, writer and educator Amanda Parris, Exhibitionists is an anthology of fast-paced short docs paired with excerpts of other CBC Arts digital series and the best arts-related content from across the CBC.
imdb.title: CBC Arts: Exhibitionists
plot: Exhibitionists is a short doc series featuring provocative artists working in all mediums who are disrupting the status quo whilst celebrating their cultures.::Exhibitionists

Exhibitionists is young, daring and born of a passionate and personal connection with innovating artists across genres from diverse communities across Canada. It features provocative artists working in all mediums who are disrupting the status quo whilst celebrating their cultures. From a young poet who conquered Instagram to an daring feminist graffiti artist, Exhibitionists captures their stories. Topical, innovative and riveting, Exhibitionists is the go-to destination to discover Canada's fresh and diverse talents, and to get up close and personal with established icons. Hosted by actor, writer and educator Amanda Parris, Exhibitionists is an anthology of fast-paced short docs paired with excerpts of other CBC Arts digital series and the best arts-related content from across the CBC.
